resources.string: An unexpected error occurred while picking the image.
There is no suitable file manager installed.
Access to storage permission has been denied
Access to storage permission has been denied. You will have to manually enable it in Settings.
Pals requires access to storage in order to be able to pick images to extract palettes from.
Access to camera permission has been denied
Access to camera permission has been denied. You will have to manually enable it in Settings.
Pals requires access to camera in order to be able to take photos and use them to extract palettes.

Pals is a tool for color palettes, with support for palettes generation from your wallpaper, an image, or even a specific color.

This app was developed by Jahir Fiquitiva.

Please consider doing a donation to support his works!

Palettes Credits:
Material Color Palettes
Flat UI Color Palettes
Choose the main theme for the app
Color navigation bar with app\'s primary dark color
Higher values will make decoding slower
